text: That's pretty bad news for multilingual HubSpot customers who have all of their languages on a single domain with a trailing country code (e.g. <http://website.com/en/|website.com/en/>, /de/, /nl/ etc.). The tree view was vital to keep an overview of the site structure... :confused:
to add to <@U4W2EG8RY> point. if an enterprise customer also has a large amount of pages, it will make it hard for them to see their content broken down
Also, when deleting old landing pages, is there an option to choose a redirect location (that would be added to url manager) or do we have to manually keep doing it?
just found the expire area options, if we expire it with redirect, can we then delete the page and the redirect stays in place?
